subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: How fans and the Mets react to Chase Utley’s aggressive slide, which broke the leg of shortstop Ruben Tejada, will not be known until Game 3 on Monday night.
snippet: How fans and the Mets react to Chase Utley’s aggressive slide, which broke the leg of shortstop Ruben Tejada, will not be known until Game 3 on Monday night.
